content.text: Match ends, Everton 1, Atalanta 5.
Second Half ends, Everton 1, Atalanta 5.
Goal!  Everton 1, Atalanta 5. Andreas Cornelius (Atalanta) header from the centre of the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Alejandro Gomez with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Beni Baningime.
Attempt blocked. Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Marten de Roon.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Remo Freuler (Atalanta) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Mattia Caldara.
Attempt missed. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Remo Freuler following a fast break.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Rafael Toloi.
Goal!  Everton 1, Atalanta 4. Andreas Cornelius (Atalanta) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mattia Caldara.
Goal!  Everton 1, Atalanta 3. Robin Gosens (Atalanta) left footed shot from outside the box to the bottom left corner following a corner.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Tom Davies.
Foul by Michael Keane (Everton).
Robin Gosens (Atalanta) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Etrit Berisha.
Attempt saved. Sandro Ramírez (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Nikola Vlasic.
Substitution, Atalanta. Andreas Cornelius replaces Bryan Cristante.
Substitution, Everton. Dominic Calvert-Lewin replaces Kevin Mirallas.
Attempt saved. Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alejandro Gomez.
Tom Davies (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Remo Freuler (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).
Offside, Everton. Wayne Rooney tries a through ball, but Kevin Mirallas is caught offside.
Goal!  Everton 1, Atalanta 2. Sandro Ramírez (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Kevin Mirallas.
Foul by José Luis Palomino (Atalanta).
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Atalanta. Robin Gosens replaces Hans Hateboer.
Substitution, Everton. Morgan Feeney replaces Jonjoe Kenny.
Attempt missed. Mattia Caldara (Atalanta) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Alejandro Gomez with a cross following a set piece situation.
Cuco Martina (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Rafael Toloi (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Everton).
Goal!  Everton 0, Atalanta 2. Bryan Cristante (Atalanta) header from the left side of the six yard box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Alejandro Gomez with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Nikola Vlasic.
Substitution, Everton. Nikola Vlasic replaces Davy Klaassen.
Foul by Davy Klaassen (Everton).
Marten de Roon (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Atalanta. Mattia Caldara replaces Andrea Masiello because of an injury.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Michael Keane.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Joel Robles.
Attempt saved. Hans Hateboer (Atalanta) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Remo Freuler.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Hans Hateboer.
Foul by José Luis Palomino (Atalanta).
Kevin Mirallas (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Tom Davies (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Remo Freuler (Atalanta).
Attempt missed. Sandro Ramírez (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right.
Attempt missed. Marten de Roon (Atalanta) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Bryan Cristante following a corner.
Attempt blocked. Bryan Cristante (Atalanta) header from the centre of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Ashley Williams.
Attempt missed. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Remo Freuler.
Foul by Kevin Mirallas (Everton).
Hans Hateboer (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Bryan Cristante.
Attempt blocked. Bryan Cristante (Atalanta) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrea Petagna.
Attempt saved. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Penalty saved! Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty Atalanta. Bryan Cristante draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Ashley Williams (Everton) after a foul in the penalty area.
Second Half begins Everton 0, Atalanta 1.
First Half ends, Everton 0, Atalanta 1.
Attempt saved. Kevin Mirallas (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Andrea Masiello (Atalanta) because of an injury.
Ashley Williams (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Ashley Williams (Everton).

Foul by Davy Klaassen (Everton).
Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Jonjoe Kenny.
Attempt missed. Michael Keane (Everton) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Wayne Rooney with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Hans Hateboer.
Attempt missed. Sandro Ramírez (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
Attempt saved. Kevin Mirallas (Everton) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sandro Ramírez.
Wayne Rooney (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by José Luis Palomino (Atalanta).
Attempt saved. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Remo Freuler.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Tom Davies (Everton).
Attempt blocked. Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) right footed shot from long range on the left is blocked.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Michael Keane.
Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Jonjoe Kenny.
Goal!  Everton 0, Atalanta 1. Bryan Cristante (Atalanta) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner.
Foul by Kevin Mirallas (Everton).
Hans Hateboer (Atalanta) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Davy Klaassen (Everton) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Bryan Cristante (Atalanta).

Corner,  Atalanta. Conceded by Davy Klaassen.
Remo Freuler (Atalanta) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kevin Mirallas (Everton).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Etrit Berisha (Atalanta) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Sandro Ramírez (Everton).
